qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing | /if left={{lastMessageId}} rule=neq right=0 {: /abort :} | /buttons labels=["Intro1","Intro2","Intro3","Intro4"] | /setvar key=intro | /run varname=intro creamsan.isvardefined | /if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq {: /setvar key=intro Intro1 :} | /if left=intro right=Intro2 rule=eq {: /swipes-go 1 :} | /if left=intro right=Intro3 rule=eq {: /swipes-go 2 :} | /if left=intro right=Intro4 rule=eq {: /swipes-go 3 :} | /run cubechan.replacespeech | /run cubechan.makeoutput | /comment
READ ME Script will 'translate' how she sounds like in phonetically consistent English. Wtf is that? Watch this or this (this card is based on this youtube channel). One problem with this script is that other characters' speech is also affected.

qrList.label: aiprocess
qrList.message:
/delay 100 |

/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=eq {: /abort :} |

/pass ... |
/if left={{lastMessage}} rule=eq right={{pipe}} {: /abort :} |

/run cubechan.replacespeech |
/run cubechan.makeoutput

qrList.label: Send
qrList.message:
/run cubechan.userprocess |
/send {{getvar::userinput}}
{{pipe}} |
/trigger || /setinput


//alt
/*
/run PRESETNAME.userprocess |
/if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq else={:
  /send {{getvar::userinput}}
{{pipe}} |
  /trigger
:}
{:
  /setvar key=blocktrigger false
:} ||
/setinput
*/

qrList.label: replacespeech
qrList.message:
/setvar key=msg {{lastMessage}} |

/re-exec find=/\".*?\"/sgi {{getvar::msg}} | /setvar key=extracted |
/foreach {{getvar::extracted}} {:
	/setvar key=it {{var::item}} | /getvar index=0 it | /setvar key=it |
	
	//a |
	/re-replace find=/(?<!a)a(?![ha])/gi replace=ah {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	
	//i |
	/re-replace find=/(?<=[bcdfgjklmnpqrstvwxyz\"]\|\s)i/gi replace=ai {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	/re-replace find=/(?<=([tsc]\|\s)h)i/gi replace=ai {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	/re-replace find=/(?<=[eiouh])i/gi replace=-ai {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	
	//y |
	/re-replace find=/(?<=[bcdfgjklmnpqrstvwxyz])y/gi replace=ai {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	/re-replace find=/(?<=([tsc]\|\s)h)y/gi replace=ai {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	/re-replace find=/(?<=[eiouh])y/gi replace=-ai {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	
	//e |
	/re-replace find=/(?<!e)e(?!e)/gi replace=ee {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	
	//u |
	/re-replace find=/(?<![uy])u/gi replace=yu {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	
	//o |
	/re-replace find=/o/gi replace=uu {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	
	//c |
	/re-replace find=/c(?!h)/gi replace=k {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |
	
	/setvar key=orig {{var::item}} | /getvar index=0 orig | /re-escape | /setvar key=orig |
	/re-escape {{getvar::it}} |
	/re-replace find=/{{getvar::orig}}/ replace={{pipe}} {{getvar::msg}} | /setvar key=msg
:} |

/pass {{getvar::msg}}
